entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:46 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
